participant_1.name: Christian
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and reflective, often expressing feelings of loneliness and discontent.
participant_1.background: I work at a nursing home. I am overweight and unhappy. My wife left me and took my children. I spend most of my time on Facebook when I am not working. I don't believe in God.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Friendly and down-to-earth, with a strong bond to their pets and a practical outlook on life.
participant_2.background: My cats are very special to me. I'm a construction worker. My dad taught me everything I know. I've 5 cats.

content.text: I didn’t go to school my dad thought me everything
